original_text: They received these towns in land that belonged to Gad's tribe: Ramoth in Gilead with its fields, Mahanaim with its fields,
korean_text: 또 갓 지파 중에서 길르앗의 라못과 그 초원과 마하나임과 그 초원과

sentences.original_text: in land that belonged to Gad's tribe
Ramoth in Gilead with its fields
sentences.korean_translation: 드고와 그 들판이 있는 길르앗의 라못
